data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Benjamin Ramassamy (2016): Description of a new long-snouted beaked whale from the Late Miocene of Denmark: evolution of suction feeding and sexual dimorphism in the Ziphiidae (Cetacea: Odontoceti). Zoological Journal of the Linnean Societ 178: 381-409, DOI: 10.1111/zoj.12418
